meaningMnemonic: This <radical>building</radical> has <radical>easy</radical> access to <kanji>sunshine</kanji>. The <kanji>sunlight</kanji> shines right in, because it's a clear building.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>sunshine</kanji> gets into the building so easily, in fact, that it hits your <reading>yo</reading>gurt (よう). The sunshine makes the yogurt... gross.
